rawText:
({
  basePath,
  callback,
  fileName,
  folderName,
  shell = true,
}: Omit<AllInputType, "command" | "type">) =>
  forAllFolders({
    type: "git",
    command: 'git add . && git commit -m "Improvements" && git push',
    basePath,
    callback,
    shell,
    fileName,
    folderName,
  })
name: gitShipAllRepos
description: `gitShipAllPackages` Just ships code everywhere to github, wherever there's a git folder and there are changes.
